For high-res devices nothing should change.

title: Added crash reports and user feedback via email.
message:
Added crash reports and user feedback via email.

This is done by the usage of the library ACRA.
Crash reports will now be send to a php script that will send the report via email to me.
I also added a dialog for sending feedback (about wrong exercises).

title: Fix #34 (No icons for custom exercises)
message:
Fix #34 (No icons for custom exercises)

Instead of a specific icon the first exercise image will be displayed as 'icon'.
This is not the perfect solution as the memory consumption may be too high.

title: Bugfix for potential app crash.
message:
Bugfix for potential app crash.

The crash occured when you:
- have used a workout before (so there were training entries)
- added a new exercise and
- wanted to continue your last training

As the new exercise had no history/training entries the app would crash later when trying to access the training entry.

title: Fix adressing issue #32
message:
Fix adressing issue #32

The bug concerned the line:

if(mExercise.getExerciseSource().equals(ExerciseSource.CUSTOM))

As an NullPointerException has been raised either mExercise or the exercise source was null.
Unfortunatelly I could not reproduce this bug, but at least the app should no longer crash at this point.
I'll close #32 for now, but nevertheless something still seems to be wrong.

title: Preparing release v0.7
message:
Preparing release v0.7

Changes:
* You can add your own exercises (Create Workout->Menu->Create exercise).
* The app has been translated to French. Thanks to Kcchouette for this translation.
* Bugfix: exercise download works again.

title: Added french translation by Kcchouette.
message:
Added french translation by Kcchouette.
Thanks for your contribution :)

title: Fixing gradle build (String save_exercise more than one time).
message: Fixing gradle build (String save_exercise more than one time).

title: Added dialog "Save Exercise".
message:
Added dialog "Save Exercise".

It will be shown when the user exits the CreateExerciseActivity.
Removed the menu item for saving the exercise.

title: Added option for deleting a custom exercise. Fixed a bug concerningâ€¦
message:
Added option for deleting a custom exercise. Fixed a bug concerning filtering/searching for exercises.

Fixed a subtle bug in a case statement of ExerciseTypeListActivity: a missing 'break;'.

title: Fix for test suite (did not build before).
message: Fix for test suite (did not build before).

title: Added the field ExerciseSource to ExerciseType.
message:
Added the field ExerciseSource to ExerciseType.
So it is possible to filter the exercises (e.g. show only self-created exercises).

title: Fragments of CreateExerciseActivity now safe & restore their state on rotation.
message: Fragments of CreateExerciseActivity now safe & restore their state on rotation.

title: Added "image-cleanup" to CreateExerciseActivity.
message:
Added "image-cleanup" to CreateExerciseActivity.

Not used images will now be delted.

title: Added possibility to change image order when creating new exercises.
message: Added possibility to change image order when creating new exercises.

title: Change of exercise-XML-format:
message:
Change of exercise-XML-format:
Replaced "imageLicenseText" attribute by "author" and "license" attributes.

This makes handling the license-metadata easier and is more similar ot the data format of wger.
Unfortunately this change affects many classes so this commit touches many files.

title: You can now set license/author of an image in ImageFragment(CreateExerciseActivity).
message:
You can now set license/author of an image in ImageFragment(CreateExerciseActivity).

It is also possible to remove an image.

title: Implemented ViewHolder-Pattern for ExerciseImageListAdapter (used for CreateExerciseActivity).
message:
Implemented ViewHolder-Pattern for ExerciseImageListAdapter (used for CreateExerciseActivity).

Awesome performance improvements.

title: Adding images in the CreateExerciseActivity is now basically working.
message: Adding images in the CreateExerciseActivity is now basically working.

title: Added a custom spinner class.
message:
Added a custom spinner class.

The original spinner does not fire the onItemSelected event if the item did not change.

title: Fixed testsuite build.
message: Fixed testsuite build.

title: Final bugfix for issue #28.
message:
Final bugfix for issue #28.

Retrieving the license information of images works again.

title: Added license for FancyCoverFlow.
message: Added license for FancyCoverFlow.

title: Bugfix for issue #28.
message:
Bugfix for issue #28.

Since the API changed the image licenses cannot be parsed anymore.
This commit fixes the error by skipping the parsing of the license,
a real bugfix will follow soon.

title: Increased weight limit (from 200 kg to 500 kg). Fixes issue #21
message:
Increased weight limit (from 200 kg to 500 kg). Fixes issue #21

Also changed implementation of exercise/image download from wger: if a downloaded exercise refers to an image that already exists, the exercise is considered to be duplicate.
Its download will be skipped.

The OnPreferenceChangeListener has not been unregistered when activity stopped what could cause a NullPointerException.

SyncFinishedDialog will now show the full language string (not 'en' but'English').

Also removed the menu item for creating new exercises. This feature will be added in the next but one release.

Added 33 new exercises.

Converted the orignal .png files to svg files. Also added some muscles and equipment to 'muscle.json' and 'equipment.json'.

Also removed two preferences that are no longer necesssary.

Some minor bugfixes.

Removed some useless lines of codes and some imports.

title: Bugfix: added notification if there's no description of an exercise (inâ€¦
message:
Bugfix: added notification if there's no description of an exercise (in FExDetailFragment and ExerciseDetailFragment).

Before there was either a not-localized message "No description available" or an alert dialog with no text.

title: Moved classes to a different package.
message: Moved classes to a different package.

title: Bugfixes for WorkoutXMLParser and FExListAdapter.
message:
Bugfixes for WorkoutXMLParser and FExListAdapter.

Bug in FExListAdapter:
If an exercise has no images the app crashed when a new training was started.

Bug in WorkoutXMLParser:
If an exercise had been deleted but was used in a workout the Workout could not be parsed/used anymore.

title: Preparing release v0.3
message: Preparing release v0.3

title: Some litte layout improvments. Removed the license text, added menu item with dialog instead.
message:
Some litte layout improvments. Removed the license text, added menu item with dialog instead.

Also improved the dialog for showing other training entries. If there are no other entries there will be a Toast instead of the dialog. The current training entry will no longer be shown in the list of other training entries.

title: Changed icon colors from white to grey.
message:
Changed icon colors from white to grey.

On older Android systems the menu background can be white and the icons were invisible.

title: Bugfix FExDetailFragment: Fixed editing TrainingEntry.
message: Bugfix FExDetailFragment: Fixed editing TrainingEntry.

title: Added a .json file that contains the ExerciseTags.
message:
Added a .json file that contains the ExerciseTags.

The ExerciseTags will now be loaded from this .json file.

title: Improved SelectWorkoutDialogFragment.
message:
Improved SelectWorkoutDialogFragment.

The option to load an old Workout will now be disabled if there are no old workouts.

title: Main activity: removed ActionBar, added settings to ListView.
message: Main activity: removed ActionBar, added settings to ListView.

title: It is now possible to remove FitnessExercises from a Workout.
message: It is now possible to remove FitnessExercises from a Workout.

title: Created an own strings.xml file for each activity package.
message: Created an own strings.xml file for each activity package.

title: Added activity for settings.
message:
Added activity for settings.

This activity contains a dialog for showing licenses.
It is also possible to disable the disclaimer dialog and to set a default workout name.

title: Choosing a different training should work now.
message:
Choosing a different training should work now.

Also fixed some minor I18N issues.

title: DialogFragmentAddEntry will now load the last used settings.
message:
DialogFragmentAddEntry will now load the last used settings.

So when the last FSet was "1 kg, 20 repetitions" the spinners will be set to "1 kg" and "20 repetitions".

title: Added dialog for selecting training entry to show.
message: Added dialog for selecting training entry to show.

title: Added dialog for choosing workout (before starting training).
message: Added dialog for choosing workout (before starting training).

title: Created a dialog to add FSets to a TrainingEntry.
message:
Created a dialog to add FSets to a TrainingEntry.

Also moved ShowWorkoutHTMLActivity to another package.

title: Fixed some bugs concerning parsing/saving a Workout from/to xml.
message:
Fixed some bugs concerning parsing/saving a Workout from/to xml.

Unfortunatelly the equals() method of Workout seems to be broken.
While:

assertEquals(mWorkout.toDebugString(), w.toDebugString());

works, :

assertEquals(mWorkout, w);

fails.

title: Removed class TrainingSubEntry, a TrainingEntry now will have FSets instead.
message:
Removed class TrainingSubEntry, a TrainingEntry now will have FSets instead.

title: Bugfix of compareTo() of ExerciseType:now localized names will be compared.
message:
Bugfix of compareTo() of ExerciseType:now localized names will be compared.

Also changed localization process: this will now only happen once.
If the user changes language while OpenTraining is running, changing languge might be ignored.

message: Added Toast message 'default_language_not_german'

title: Added support for exercise name I18N.
message:
Added support for exercise name I18N.

Besides the standard name you can now provide translations
Example: <Locale language="en" name="english name"/>
The standard name now should also contain information about the language.
Example: <ExerciseType language="de" name="Arnold Presse">

If there is no language information for an exercise this will be logged.
Same if there is no translation to the language the user needs.
